readable.title: 2652522323_9218afd8c2
readable.content: A child and her mother are playing ball in a park . A little girl with a hat playing ball with her mom . A young asian girl with a woman plays with a blue ball in a part setting . A young woman and her daughter play with a blue and white beach ball in the grass . Girl with tan dress and a hat with woman in a grey top with blue ball on ground .
